description: This file defines the ConsultationProvider class, which manages consultation data including fetching and scheduling consultations, acting as a state management component in a Flutter application.

classes.name: ConsultationProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider for managing consultation data, including fetching consultations and scheduling new ones.

methods.name: fetchConsultations
methods.description: Fetches a list of consultations from the API, optionally filtered by patient ID and doctor ID, with pagination support.

methods.name: schedule
methods.description: Schedules a new consultation by posting data to the API and then re-fetching consultations to update the state.
